law.catch_line: The Board of County Commissioners of St. Mary's County may borrow funds for paying part or all of th...
law.text: The Board of County Commissioners of St. Mary's County may borrow funds for paying part or all of the capital construction costs or of the costs of preservation for public libraries in St. Mary's County; and they may issue bonds, notes, or other evidences of indebtedness for the repayment of any such borrowed funds, and may levy for payments of principal and of interest on these evidences of indebtedness.
